Posts.Content: Hi I have not written anything before but I now feel very unsure of things. Have had 24 lymph nodes removed 7 had cancer cells though the tissue clearance was clear. Now heading for the road of chemo this has hit me how real everything is now. I am frightend and trying to be positive and strong. But now and again I do break down. Its been good looking at how everyone supports each other . I could really do with some extra support right now. Family are good but dont understand how I really feel.
Posts.Title: Feeling as though the cancer is now real

Posts.Content: Thanks for your message of support it has made me feel much better. Having CT scan tomorrow and Bone scan. Will have to wait for a week for results then hopefully find out when chemo starts. Hope you are ok. love and hugs xxxxxx Rosemary xx
Posts.Title: Feeling as though the cancer is now real

Posts.Content: Hi I have had , had a lump removed and sentinal lymph nodes cancer in 2 and in surrounding tissue, had another op to remove more tissue and full node clearance, 4 weeks ago I am ok just a bit of soreness but otherwise no probs so far. Due to have first chemo on 9th July not looking forward to it. Glad your chemo went ok . I am to have radiotherapy too. Wishing you well keep strong and positive. Rosiexx
Posts.Title: Just had my first chemo

Posts.Content: Hi I have had , had a lump removed and sentinal lymph nodes cancer in 2 and in surrounding tissue, had another op to remove more tissue and full node clearance, 4 weeks ago I am ok just a bit of soreness but otherwise no probs so far. Due to have first chemo on 9th July not looking forward to it. Glad your chemo went ok . I am to have radiotherapy too. Wishing you well keep strong and positive. Rosiexx
Posts.Title: Just had my first chemo

Posts.Content: Glad you are home , I had my 1st docetaxol on Tuesday was ok until the saturday when I just felt awful achey joints ear ache, my temp went up but not enough to be amitted to hospital. All I wanted to sleep so the weekend went in a blur, My mouth is like a fur ball, Hate the feeling of being out of control, Have been really tearful, about silly things , Hope as this week progresses I will be feeling better. So glad you are feeling better and hopfully next time will not be so bad, Sending you a big hug xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Rosie xxx
Posts.Title: Docetaxol You B*****D !!!
